DOC.brief_title: Positioning Surgical Patients With Sleep Apnea
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize control trial comprise two stage . Stage 1 pilot study 30 patient high risk diagnose obstructive sleep apnea schedule routine surgery . These patient randomize 1:1:1 standard care ( 0 degree bed angle ) , 30 degree bed angle , 60 degree bed angle . Acute hypoxic event analyze pre post-op randomly assign bed position . PACU nurse also survey patient-favored non-supine positioning ( 30 vs. 60 degree ) . Stage 2 large , powered trial evaluate efficacy one bed angle ( 30 60 degree ) base Stage 1 result .
